modules.name: Data Ingestion
modules.description: Module responsible for collecting customer feedback from various sources (e.g., social media, surveys, reviews).

modules.name: Sentiment Analysis
modules.description: Module that uses NLP techniques to classify the sentiment of customer feedback (positive, negative, neutral).

modules.name: Data Storage
modules.description: Module for storing processed customer feedback and sentiment scores in MongoDB.

modules.name: API
modules.description: REST API built with Spring Boot to expose sentiment analysis results and analytics.

modules.name: Dashboard
modules.description: Interactive React.js dashboard for visualizing sentiment trends and analytics.

data_flow.description: Customer feedback is ingested, processed for sentiment, stored in MongoDB, and visualized on the dashboard via the API.
